subject: Re: "require" question
body:
> When I see code that starts with:
> 
> require 5.6.0;
> 
> Does that mean that the version of Perl can be 5.6.0
> and above or that 
> it *has to be* 5.6.0?

...that version and above 
see the output from;
perldoc -f require
